settings.question: What is the SAADAA Community?
settings.answer: The SAADAA Community is a growing circle of individuals who connect with our values that are slow living, conscious choices and real conversations. We host events, run feedback loops, and share sneak peeks and behind-the-scenes on this space.

settings.question: How do I become part of the SAADAA Community?
settings.answer:
You can join us by following us on:

Instagram Channel
WhatsApp Channel

settings.question: What do I get as part of the WhatsApp community?
settings.answer:
As a member, you’ll get:

  • First dibs on new collections and exclusive offers
  • Event invites (like BAAT CHEET)
  • Access to community-only sales & try-ons
  • A chance to share feedback and shape upcoming designs with your votes

settings.question: How do SAADAA events work?
settings.answer: SAADAA events are designed to spark real conversations and meaningful connections. From intimate gatherings where we paint, talk, try clothes, and exchange feedback to interactive workshops with local artists, each event is a reflection of our slow, conscious values.Invites are shared first on our WhatsApp and Instagram Community. Most events are free but require RSVP due to limited slots.
